info.title: Business Partner (A2X)
info.description: This service enables you to create, display, update, and delete data related to Business Partner, Supplier, and Customer with the data provided in a payload, in an API call. This service also supports create deep entity operation and batch processing.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update or delete the master data for business partner, supplier or customer using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Business Partner, Customer and Supplier Integration (SAP_COM_0008)
SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration (SAP_COM_0087)
SAP Real Estate Contract API Integration (SAP_COM_0393)
Resource Management in SAP Project and Resource Management - API Integration (SAP_COM_0A11)
[Invoice Processing with SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management (4N6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4N6 " Link To BP ")
[Standalone Manual Transportation Planning (6W5)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6W5 " Link To BP ")
[Import Connection Setup with SAP Analytics Cloud (1YB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1YB " Link To BP ")
[Integration of SAP S/4HANA and SAP Cloud for Real Estate (4X3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4X3 " Link To BP ")
[Enablement of SAP Excise Tax Management (4LO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4LO " Link To BP ")
[Resource Management for Projects (6JO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6JO " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
If you are working with key user extensibility, the API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Master Data: Business Partner (BP_CUSTVEND1)
* Customer Core View (CUSTOMER_GENERAL)
* Customer company code core (CUST_COMPANYCODE)
* Partner Sales area core view (CUST_SALES)
* Supplier Core View (SUPPLIER_GENERAL)
* Supplier Company Code Core (SUP_COMPANYCODE)
* Supplier Purchasing Org Core (SUP_PURORG)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.description: Retrieves general data of all the supplier records available in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Retrieves supplier general data by using supplier number.
get.description: Retrieves the general data of the supplier record by using supplier number.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates supplier general data by using supplier number.

top.name: $top
